# source code at bfv_test.sol

account_new acc1 10000000000

# Deploy Contract

transaction_build tx01
    sender acc1
    nonce 0
    receiverAddress 00
    value 0
    data 
    gas 2000000
    build

block_build b01
    parent g00
    transactions tx01
    build

block_connect b01
assert_best b01

# invoke bfvAddTest

transaction_build tx02
    sender acc1
    nonce 1
    contract tx01   # created in tx01
    value 0
    data  # bfvAddTest
    gas 2000000000
    build

block_build b02
    parent b01
    transactions tx02
    gasLimit 3000000000
    build

block_connect b02
assert_best b02

assert_tx_success tx01
#assert_tx_success tx02
